label: A2B2C_mP20_14_2e_2e_e-001
title: $\alpha$-SrRh$_{2}$As$_{2}$ Structure
comments: SrRh$_{2}$As$_{2}$ is known to have two temperature-driven structural phase transitions (Zinth, 2012): \begin{itemize} \item Below 463K it is in this \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_mP20_14_2e_2e_e-001}{monoclinic $\alpha$-SrRh$_{2}$As$_{2}$ structure}. \item In the range 463-555K it is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_oF20_69_g_f_a-001}{orthorhombic $\beta$-SrRh$_{2}$As$_{2}$ structure}. \item Above 555K $\gamma$-SrRh$_{2}$As$_{2}$ is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-003}{tetragonal ThCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$ structure}. \end{itemize}
